channel.title: Use gocache in .circleci
channel.description:
From https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/pull/561
[quote="krhubert"] I have removed coverprofile because we don't use it now and go test cache doesn't work with it.
It has open issues about it: - https://github.com/golang/go/issues/23565 - https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/go/+/90955/
So we need to remove coverprofile to speed up the tests or wait for go 1.12 (or maybe even 1.13, because I don't see this issue on 1.12 milestone)
---
As decided, we keep coverprofile and waits to go team to fix the issues. [/quote]

item.title: Use gocache in .circleci
item.dc:creator: Nicolas
item.description:
From https://github.com/mesg-foundation/core/pull/561

krhubert:

I have removed coverprofile because we don’t use it now and go test cache doesn’t work with it.

It has open issues about it:

  • https://github.com/golang/go/issues/23565
  • https://go-review.googlesource.com/c/go/+/90955/

So we need to remove coverprofile to speed up the tests or wait for go 1.12 (or maybe even 1.13, because I don’t see this issue on 1.12 milestone)

As decided, we keep coverprofile and waits to go team to fix the issues.

Read full topic
